results.name: Expansion of 1/(1 + x*Product_{k>=1} (1 - x^k)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
mathematica: m = 44; CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 + x*Product[1 - x^k, {k, 1, m}]), {x, 0, m}], x] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 05 2021 *)
